thread.title: ‘Angry Indian Goddesses’ gets standing ovation at Rome film fest
thread.title_full: ‘Angry Indian Goddesses’ gets standing ovation at Rome film fest

title: ‘Angry Indian Goddesses’ gets standing ovation at Rome film fest
text: ‘Angry Indian Goddesses’ gets standing ovation at Rome film fest Sunday, 25 October 2015 (9 minutes ago) Pan Nalin’s film "Angry Indian Goddesses" (AIG) received an eight-minute long standing ovation by the critics and reviewers at the Rome Film Festival.
